prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with sleek, blue and white features that resemble a stealthy spy.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings, featuring shades of blue and purple.
Design a Pokemon with a long, elegant body, perfect for sneaking through its environment.
Show me a Pokemon that is both agile and intelligent, with distinctive markings that hint at its abilities.
Generate a water-type Pokemon that excels in stealth and has a unique sniper-like appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that has a sleek, streamlined body shape and utilizes water in its attacks.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a master spy, with colors that reflect a watery habitat.
